name: BRUTUS SELF DEFENSE KEY CHAIN
description:
Bulldog Defense Keychain - Brutus

Brutus Bull Dog Self Defense Keychain- Black, Brown, Red, Blue, Yellow, Purple and Pink. And now Teal, Moss Green and Burnt Orange. These Bulldogs are made of very strong ABS plastic that is unbreakable. This plastic is as strong as metal. It is very easy to carry. You can attach it to your keys. You put your fingers through the eye holes and the tips of the ears can be used to defend your self against an attacker. Even if you miss with a punch this key chain will lengthen your reach. Even if your punch or wipe is a bit off target you can still catch him and inflict pain from any direction. This is a force multiplier that is better than knuckles, lighter and extends your reach.
The eye holes are about a 13 ring size. Most people will wear in front of the 2nd knuckle so these will fit almost everyone. 3.5" x 2.5

name: D.O.T. CRUISER- BLACK METAL FLAKE
description:
~Meets Or Exceeds D.O.T. Standards.
~The Smallest D.O.T. 3/4 Shell Helmet Ever Made!!
~With Three Different Shell Sizes You're Sure To Get That Proportionate Fit!!
~Moisture Wicking Fabric To Keep Your Head Cooler And More Comfortable.
~Each Helmet Is Custom Designed And May Vary In Color Or Composition.
~This Is The Closest You Can Get To An Airbrushed Or Custom Painted Helmet.
~UV Lacquer Finish.
~Comes With A Free Head Wrap (Valued At $5.95).
~Comes With A Gloss Black Bubble Visor (Valued At $4.95). 
~Also Comes With A Draw String Cloth Bag.
~Nylon Y-Strap System. 
~Available Only With Removable, Snap On Gloss Black Bubble Visor.
~Fiberglass Shell: Stronger, Lighter, Safer.

~Dimensions:
Size	Length	Width	Height	Weight
XS	9 5/8	8 5/8	9 1/8	1.82 lb
S	9 5/8	8 5/8	9 1/8	1.80 lb
M	10 1/8	9      	9 5/8	1.88 lb
L	10 1/8	9      	9 5/8	1.86 lb
XL	10 5/8	9 1/4	9 3/4	2.12 lb
2XL	10 5/8	9 1/4	9 3/4	2.10 lb
